productName: COBY MP-C651 MP3 Player w/512 MB Flash Memory
title: MP3s OK, WMAs a joke
author: Scott Aaron
fullText: bought mp3 player couple weeks ago price 512 mb storage device playing mp3 files navigation contents player easy ticked playing wma files ive bought songs msn music stores device playing files exaggeration dont wma file bought plays cleanly actually play causes player hang forcing remove battery shut pushing controls try file start otherwise hang emailed customer service whats wrong tell file protected cant played file actually play apparently statement file cant played files play perfectly mp3wma devices apparently fails claim files played files cant played play cant played repeatedly coby totally ignored ive tried help diagnose bit rate indicated lcd bit lower rate actually file conclusion market pure mp3 player isnt bad claim plays wmas joke
